snippet: During an interview with "60 Minutes," Representative Eric Cantor, the House majority leader, strongly defended his party's dug-in opposition to tax increases last year.
abstract: During an interview with "60 Minutes," Representative Eric Cantor, the House majority leader, strongly defended his party's dug-in opposition to tax increases last year.
lead_paragraph: During an interview with "60 Minutes," Representative Eric Cantor, Republican of Virginia and the House majority leader, strongly defended his party's dug-in opposition to tax increases last year, saying it reflected the party's core values, but he seemed to stumble when recounting former President Ronald Reagan's record on taxes.

headline.main: Cantor Defends House G.O.P. Stance on Tax Increases
